https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zJGglhvEbjMQAhVc4lzMHTeUyav.jpg Sunny is a na√Øve circus performer who dreams of inheriting his father's knife-throwing skills. However, his hostile colleagues continue to bully him, relegating him to a lowly clown. On a tour to Malaysia, Cheung and other performers discover a cave occupied by the Japanese army during World War II. Instead of finding treasure, the performers - including Sunny - are sprayed with a mysterious chemical that turns them into superhuman mutants... City Under Siege
